text: Breed 77 is the debut studio album by Gibraltarian flamenco metal band Breed 77. It was originally released in 2000 and re-released in 2005 due to popular demand.[ Breed 77], Allmusic. Accessed on line December 24, 2007. The album was also released as a limited edition in a crucifix-style fold-out digipak. In 2005 "Shadows" from this album was released as a single. All tracks in this album written by Breed 77 and produced, mixed and engineered by Paul Hoare. ==Track listing== #"Shadows" – 3:09 #"Rise" – 4:12 #"Switch" – 3:38 #"Breaking The Silence" – 5:09 #"Karma" – 4:56 #"Floods" – 5:51 #"Final Prayer" – 5:59 #"A Safe Place" – 3:49 #"Fly" – 5:09 #"Eyes That See" – 4:26 #"Know That You Know" – 4:00 #"The Hole" – 3:23 ==References== Category:Breed 77 albums Category:2000 debut albums
title: Breed 77 (album)
